name: recent-bookmarks
description: A modern browser extension to track, organize, and reflect on your recent bookmarks

scripts.build:firefox: web-ext build --artifacts-dir=./dist/firefox --overwrite-dest --ignore-files=node_modules dist .git .github CONTRIBUTING.md EXECUTIVE_SUMMARY.md MARKETING_QUICK_START.md MODERNIZATION_STRATEGY.md MONETIZATION_STRATEGY.md MVP_ROADMAP.md package.json package-lock.json .eslintrc.js .gitignore
scripts.package: npm run lint && npm run build:firefox

author: Newman5
